Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Karlov
ShortDescription: #72 North buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via North Avenue, Pulaski, Grand & North Avenue due to fire department activity near North Avenue/Karlov.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Avenue, Pulaski, Grand, then resume their normal route on North Avenue.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to fire department activity near North Avenue/Karlov.
